attributes.review: I downloaded the app as a supporter, but by the time I downloaded, there were glitches and stuff on the app! And before you know it, it gave me an extra chromosome, and it made me go “that’s a lot of damage” to my brain cells! Now I’m thinking that this app was made from government cheese. That’s an absolute no from me chief. At this point I got scoliosis and carpal tunnel syndrome, and I need surgery. 0/10 IGN. Would NEVER play again. Periodt.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE App

attributes.review: Downloaded this app to stay up to date with the country but then as soon as I opened the app a bunch of cameras like popped out of my walls and started recording while a tiny voice in the background was singing god bless America and there was a constant flow of notifications, each notification had a different word in the constitution. Had to get a new phone it was so bad. Don’t get it.
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: I opened up the app and my grandma had the urge to fight me ON SIGHT ✨. She tried to judo flip me and stuck me in the freezer with the muffins. Not only was I attacked, this app ran TERRIBLY SLOW and I downloaded this to just see and keep up with the current President because who knows what twitter fingers will do next, but the app had awful execution and looked like it was designed by a toddler. 10/10 would never recommend to ANYONE.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review:
I have no idea what is wrong with this app, but then second I downloaded and opened it, my phone forced a shut down. Like my screen went black, the little loading symbol that means it's shutting down appeared, then it was off! My phone didn't turn back on for minutes! I don't know if there's a bug in the app or what, but DO NOT risk your phone for this app!! 

THIS APP SHOULD BE REMOVED FROM THE APP STORE FOR CAUSING HARM TO PHONES.
attributes.title: Do Not Download !!

attributes.review: This app runs extremely slow, and took up nearly all of my phone’s storage! There are numerous bugs and glitches that caused my entire phone to shut down. When I turned my phone back on, all of my apps, photos, text messages and contacts were deleted. I am extremely disappointed in this app. I expected much better.
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review: literally the worst app EVERRR!! why this booty app even exists anyways😂😭😭 anyways, the Smurf’s came back and tried to sell my couch to the lady on the corner, but turns out she went left, and didn’t come right because my hair conditioner was full but couldn’t get anything out cause there was no more, and the dragon made a half court shot at the three point lines, and that’s why KPOP will always be better than America.
attributes.title: GEN Z TAKEOVER

attributes.review: Please do not download this app, I have the Iphone 11 and my phone runs very smoothly. After downloading this app I noticed my phone began to glitch and run slow, this app not only glitches and crashes when you open it but ALSO makes your ENTIRE phone glitch and lag as you use it. Deleted it immediately and couldn’t have been happier.
attributes.title: Glitches

attributes.review: "Nations are not communities and never have been. The history of any country, presented as the history of a family, conceals fierce conflicts of interest (sometimes exploding, most often repressed) between conquerors and conquered, masters and slaves, capitalists and workers, dominators and dominated in race and sex. And in such a world of conflict, a world of victims and executioners, it is the job of thinking people, as Albert Camus suggested, not to be on the side of the executioners” Howard Zinn
attributes.title: Definitely fake news

attributes.review: When I downloaded it it literally gave my phone a virus so it would only show me pictures of peaches and not the frites and to top that off I can’t use my phone anymore so I have to Wright thins on my refrigerator, which was stollen because the app gave away my location and made it so all of my stuff was sold on Greg’s list and I didn’t even get any money for, SO DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT TO BE POOR AND REFRIGERATER LESS!!!!😤😡😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!!!!

attributes.review: The first time I opened the app, there was a jump-scare of some old orange white Cheeto man. This was the scariest photo I’ve seen in my entire 17 years of living. They also somehow hacked into my phone and registered me as a republican. Then I walk outside my house to find some Republicans putting trump signs outside my house. I told them to go away but they started to throw Cheeto dust all over me and shout sexist things at me. No thank you
attributes.title: No.
